title: Prince to Kinjirareta Koi
original_name: プリンスと禁じられた恋
sinopse:
“Have we met before?” A mysterious handsome young man named Ernest approaches Sherry, an aspiring actress working at a café. Sherry is strangely attracted to him, but the two suddenly get involved in a bank robbery. The truth is, however, that Ernest is actually a prince hiding his identity...!?

(Source: Jmanga)
